duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and cook pastry items according to specification/recipe.
Ensure that all dishes served meet the standard.
Act as a role model while taking part in service – preparing and cooking dishes.
Monitor wastage and complete assigned tasks on multiple stations within the given time to meet strict deadlines.
Keep the immediate work area clean and perform other duties as assigned by the supervisor.
Comply with all food safety and hygiene regulations as stated in the food safety management system handbook.
Report problems with the food safety management system to their manager and the hygiene and food safety team.

education_certification.credential: Certificate in culinary arts, pastry-making, baking or relevant field is desirable
